attributes.action: Release Mr Munir Hussain and Tokeer Hussain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Munnir and his Brother were defending their family after being broken in and held by a gang of captors in High Wycombe they then fought back and caught one of the captors which resulted in him sustaining injury 
We feel that this case is one of protecting ones family and Mr Munir Hussains actions were out self defence and protection of his family and a gross miscarriage of justice has occured and we ask he is released as a matter of urgeny 
This sends out a wrong message allowing criminals to go out with knives and when someone stands up to them they are then the victims and the innocent law abiding citizen who defends his home is treated as a criminal is a disgrace

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
